Kitkat and Drillbit aren't anywhere near Granite.  They are still in 
the CR room in Destructor's base.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Sharpedge:::
> 
> ::He picks Granite up with one arm and usines his spinner arm on 
his chest.  
> When he sees Kitkat and Drillbit, he throws Sharpedge away from him 
and Fires 
> 1 missle at Drillbit, and 1 at KitKat::
